attributes.action: apply diplomatic, economic and military pressure to ensure Israel dismantles the Israeli West-Bank Barrier and complies with all outstanding UN resolutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Israel continues to blatently ignore international law. Israel has failed to recognise the illegality of its actions. This must stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
